🇩🇪GERMANY CONDEMNS ATTACK ON TESLA GIGAFACTORY

Calling the attack “a form of terrorism,” German politician Dietmar Woidke said: “It is obviously a serious attack on our critical infrastructure with consequences for thousands of people as well as many small and large businesses in our country.”

Left-wing extremists, the Vulkan Group, have claimed responsibility for the attack, stating they wanted to “shut down Tesla.”

The power supply has now been restored to the Gigafactory.

Source: NTV

When we attended in 2021 we spent a good 4 hours touring the factory (yes we're geeks) and speaking with as many local people (albeit in poor German / English) as possible and they all loved Tesla. Maybe Tesla refused the negative people from attending (not sure how they would know) or maybe it's just a tiny minority that actually are negative about the factory... The fact remains that the trees planted around this factory were planted to be cut down... you can tell as they were all planted in neat rows and extremely close to one another which forces them to grow tall quickly which makes them ideal for making things from.

If this was a petrol chemical factory or a new BMW factory for petrol cars I'd understand it but it's a factory producing electric cars which can be charged from sun or wind power and are infinitely better for the environment than petrol and diesel cars 🤷‍♂️

Oh and Tesla are planting 3x the number of trees (albeit 60+ miles away)...
